thread.title: EU leaders prepare for battle over post-Brexit budget

title: EU leaders prepare for battle over post-Brexit budget
text:
EU leaders prepare for battle over post-Brexit budget 11:01am EST - 01:54 
European Union leaders staked out opposing positions on the size and aims of the bloc's budget on Friday ahead of tough negotiations to deal with a hole in Brussels' finances created by Britain's planned departure next year. David Pollard reports.   
European Union leaders staked out opposing positions on the size and aims of the bloc's budget on Friday ahead of tough negotiations to deal with a hole in Brussels' finances created by Britain's planned departure next year. David Pollard reports.  //reut.rs/2ENM4GH
